Description of incident: On May 27, 2014 Benjamin Franklin Edwards & Company (BFE) discovered an unauthorized access to their database which may have resulted in personal information of it's customers being compromised. The company did not provide the exact information that was stored on their system, nor have they communicated how many individuals were involved. For those that have an account and may have been affected the company is offering one year free of AllClearPro. They are asking individuals to contact their financial consultant for more information or go to www.enroll.allclearid.com to enroll.
